alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:25PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile, central Baldwin, southwestern Escambia, northern Santa Rosa, northwestern Escambia and southern George Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1124 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Poarch Creek Reservation to 4 miles west of Satsuma to 10 miles north of Latimer. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Bay Minette, Atmore, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Robertsdale, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Century, Flomaton, Loxley, Chunchula and Stockton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...northwestern Florida...and southeastern Mississippi.
